pricing.title: Choose Your Path to Inner Peace
pricing.subtitle: Every plan includes the same quality KIAAN guidance. Choose based on how often you'd like to connect.

changePlan.q: Can I change my plan later?
changePlan.a: Yes! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately for upgrades, or at the end of your billing period for downgrades.

quota.q: What happens when I exceed my question quota?
quota.a: You can still use all other features like journaling, mood tracking, and breathing exercises. Your quota resets at the start of each billing period.

security.a: Absolutely. Your journal entries are encrypted on your device. We never sell your data and maintain strict privacy standards.

refund.a: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
